attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The "official" London 2012 olympics logo has been released and is an absolute disgrace to this country - a three year old could have designed something more meaningful.

Please scrap this logo (and insist on a refund for the waste of public money), and hold an open competition for the people of the United Kingdom to design something more meaningful.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
